attributes.action: Bring Back Nit Nurse In All Schools!
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair to all us parents who are spending lots of money on treatments which are ridiculous prices to start with and have others whom don't treat their child's hair re infest the whole school.I
attributes.background: Due to the ever growing number of head lice infestations in schools. The government should look at introducing nit nurses back into the schools. These nits are becoming immune to the repellents being used and therefore we are not getting anywhere in treatment.
